name: Nightly Escape (Pre-Alpha 0.4)
description:
Quick Summary:
This is my first ever Unity game. It isn't my first video game I made though as I made games over on Roblox.

Goal:
The goal is simple (For now anyways), it's to try to escape the house while trying to avoid your Father. To escape the house, you must find a key to unlock the front door to escape.

Disclaimer:
this is pre-alpha, so try not get attached to anything in the game as it may change. As progress goes on, the game may take longer to beat, more ways to escape, and more.

Genre: Horror

Kickstarter:

I have created a Kickstarter to help gain support. So help by supporting over there as well as sharing.

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/jonathanpecany/nightly-escape/description
